title: Large Mardi Gras Banner Decor, Mardi Gras Porch Sign Welcome Banner, Mardi Gras Masquerade Party Accessory, Carnival Party Hanging Decoration for Indoor Outdoor Decoration (8.2 x 1.5 FT)
features: Package includes: the package comes with 1 piece Mardi Gras banner and 1 piece long strap; This banner is designed with a large domino background, and large Mardi Gras lettering with gold, purple and green beads, and other Mardi gras themed patterns, which is in line with Mardi Gras, impressive decoration to boost atmosphere for holding Mardi Gras party or Mardi gras parade

Wide applications: this masquerade banner is an eye-catching ornaments for Mardi Gras, which can be applied as a welcoming front door sign or party decoration, creating enjoyable atmosphere to your festival; Mardi Gras banner decor is also suitable to be hung on the ceilings and windows of rooms, home, office and classroom, or directly hang it on gardens and parades

Durable and reusable material: the Mardi Gras decor banner is made of polyester, lightweight, sturdy and thick, durable enough for long time use; With a proper size, the welcome banner can be hung on your door, wall, porch or the entrance of your party, making it easy for you guest to locate your house from a long distance and definitely making a your party fabulously funny

Easy to decorate: there is a metal ring on the each corner of this banner, which make the strap easy to pass through; And the length of strap is enough and the material is sturdy, you just need spend a few minutes to find an suitable place and hang it up; This decor banner is a lovely banner, which will add the special touch to your party; After using, you can fold it up to easy to storage and storage for next time use

Size details: the banner measures approx 46 x 250 cm/ 18 x 98 inches, and the strap is about 236 inches/ 600 cm, which you can tailor into the suitable length according to your need; You can hang it on the tree, your yard, ceiling, doorway, window, archway or any places your want, or as a backdrop for taking photos
